name: intrinsics::simd::SimdAlign
doc_adt: A type for alignment options for SIMD masked load/store intrinsics.

VariantIdx(Some(0))-FieldIdx(None).name: Unaligned
VariantIdx(Some(0))-FieldIdx(None).doc: No alignment requirements on the pointer

VariantIdx(Some(1))-FieldIdx(None).name: Element
VariantIdx(Some(1))-FieldIdx(None).doc: The pointer must be aligned to the element type of the SIMD vector

VariantIdx(Some(2))-FieldIdx(None).name: Vector
VariantIdx(Some(2))-FieldIdx(None).doc: The pointer must be aligned to the SIMD vector type
